entry.title: New release for Postiz: LinkedIn Carousel implementation
entry.content:
You can upload a Carousel on the LinkedIn platform by uploading a PDF. We thought about simplifying the process without breaking your workflow. Just upload images as you have already done, and in the LinkedIn settings, mark it as "Post as images carousel." Postiz converts it to a PDF in the background and posts it to LinkedIn.

What's Changed

  • Fix typo in logout text by @poteirard in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/782
  • Fix pnpx by @ennogelhaus in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/785
  • LinkedIn post as carousel by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/786

New Contributors

  • @poteirard made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/782

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.47.0...v1.48.0
